QuestData.Title: A Travel Journal
QuestData.Description:
<This book appears to be a travelogue of this book's personal journey around Ardenweald! And self-written and published no less!
Flipping towards the end you see yourself enter the picture as a villain, unjustly attacking the book and opening it.
You read "This book appears to be a travelogue of this book's personal journey around Ardenweald! And Self-written and-"
You hurriedly close the book, feeling queasy. It should go back to Archivist Dreyden.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Travel Journal to Archivist Dreyden in the Grove of Memory.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Travel Journal to Archivist Dreyden in the Grove of Memory.
